lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Earlier on Tuesday congressional leaders called for an economic summit with the White House to address the nation's budget and trade deficits that some analysts say were partly to blame for the stock market drop.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But Reagan announced his willingness to negotiate with Congress after meeting for about an hour with White House Chief of Staff Howard Baker, Treasury Secretary James Baker, Federal Reserve Board Chairman Alan Greenspan and chief economic adviser Beryl Sprinkel.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "I think it is preferable, if possible that the executive and legislative branches reach a budget deficit reduction package.

lst.name: sentence
